manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Face Moisturizer for Men What started out as a hobby between two bearded friends, quickly turned into a phenomena which has taken the Men’s Grooming Industry by storm! Men's Grooming is a passionate affair and we take it very seriously, in just 1 year, we’ve become the go-to brand for Beard Care and Men’s Grooming. Go ahead, Join the Viking Revolution and see what we are all about.

Feel Fresh Our facial moisturizer for men works with any type of skin, oily and dry, hydrating your face with a non greasy feeling. All Natural Don't damage your skin with harsh chemicals, the natural face moisturizer nourishes and protects your skin. Skin Care for Men Apply the anti wrinkle & anti aging cream daily to protect your skin and diminish the look of lines and wrinkles.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I work mainly outdoors and during the winter months I struggle with dry/wind burned face. Started using this about a month ago and it’s working great. No dry patchy face and it doesn’t make my face feel oily. Absorbs quickly and smells nice

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I use this moisturizer every day. Works great and feels great. Think using moisturizer every day helps with stopping wrinkles so it gets great value for your buck

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Game changer Moisturizer
reviews.reviewText: I have always struggled with finding the perfect moisturizer that suits my skin's needs. I have tried several moisturizers available on Amazon but never found like with great price. This moisturizer has truly been a game-changer for my skin, and I cannot recommend it enough. The texture of this moisturizer is incredibly lightweight and non-greasy except smell. Unlike other moisturizers I've tried in the past, this moisturizer absorbs quickly, leaving no residue or sticky feeling behind. As this moisturizer is packed with nourishing and natural components such as hyaluronic acid and aloe vera, this moisturizer not only hydrates but also helps to improve the overall health and appearance of your skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I get very dry and cracked skin in the winter. It gets quite painful. With the use of this hand cream I have experienced less cracks and quicker healing time or at least an extremely lower duration of pain. I was sceptical at first as I have used other creams but this one has certainly made a highly noticable impact.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It works well and helps with dry skin on the face
reviews.reviewText: So Im a normal guy who has never thought much about skincare. But a couple years ago I wanted to try something to potentially brighten up my appearance as I felt like I was always looking tired. Obviously this stuff isn’t going to work miracles but I do notice I look and feel better when I use this. I also can’t believe how soft my face feels after using this. I’ve never spent much time thinking about my face softness before, but once I started using this I was like “wow.” The biggest way that this helps my appearance though is that I regularly get white, flakey, dead skin on my nose and for years and years I have tried to either scrub it off with a washcloth and water, I’ve tried using tweezers to pick the skin off, but none of that actually worked. It just came back instantly. But now when I get that, I just put a drop of this on my finger and rub it on my nose and the dead skin is gone for at least the rest of the day. If your a dude just looking to start some basic skincare I say this product is a great place to start.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Thin, greasy, and made in China
reviews.reviewText: This lotion has a wonderful masculine smell and feels refreshing on your skin. However, it's very thin (i.e runny) and leaves your face looking greasy and shiny after application. Also, the brand and high price would make you think this was made in a Nordic/Northern European country with very high quality ingredients. However, if you look at the fine print you'll see that it's made in China. So, once again you're paying top dollar for questionable quality. My recommendation would be to spend a couple more dollars and buy something from Highlands Naturals like their Anti-Aging Face Cream for men. It's a thick cream, made of high quality natural ingredients and made in Clearwater, Florida, USA. Don't waste your money on this cheap Chinese garbage.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This stuff is awesome. It has a nice subtle minty smell, not too strong. I get dry patches under my eyes along my cheek bones, this stuff has definitely taken care of that. Not greasy at all, absorbs well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Made in China
reviews.reviewText: It had a pleasant scent and won’t leave your face greasy. Took a star away because it was Made in China
